meanings.sent1: The undesignated seat was available for anyone to sit in.
meanings.sent2: The undesignated parking spots were first come, first served.
meanings.sent3: The undesignated cookie mysteriously disappeared from the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her undesignated role as the team motivator brought everyone together.
meanings.sent5: The undesignated path through the forest led to a hidden waterfall.

meanings.definition: Not assigned or allocated to a particular purpose
meanings.sent1: The undesignated funds could be used for any project.
meanings.sent2: The undesignated room in the house was a versatile space.
meanings.sent3: He wore an undesignated hat to the formal event, causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: The undesignated time on his schedule allowed for spontaneity.
meanings.sent5: The undesignated box contained a mix of random items.
